sections.visual_prompt: A visually engaging background with the title 'Quantum Computing & Cybersecurity'. Below, a brief animation of a digital circuitry or quantum bits (qubits) entangled in motion to capture attention.

sections.content: The first main point of the script goes here.
sections.visual_prompt: A close-up shot of a computer screen displaying a cybersecurity symbol. Above it, an image explaining basic concepts of quantum computing and its potential impact on traditional cybersecurity.

sections.content: The second main point of the script goes here.
sections.visual_prompt: A sequence showing a hacker trying to break into a network. Then, transition to a visual representing qubits breaking through classical security protocols, symbolizing quantum computing's impact on cybersecurity.

A final slide with the title 'What's Next?' and an image or diagram showing how organizations are adapting to quantum-resistant algorithms. Encourage viewers to stay informed about advancements in cybersecurity.
